verses.verse: מִזְמ֡וֹר <WH4210> A Psalm שִׁ֤ירוּ <WH7891> O sing לַֽיהוָ֨ה ׀ <WH3068> unto the LORD שִׁ֣יר <WH7892> song חָ֭דָשׁ <WH2319> a new כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for נִפְלָא֣וֹת <WH6381> marvellous things עָשָׂ֑ה <WH6213> for he hath done הוֹשִֽׁיעָה־ <WH3467> hath gotten him the victory לּ֥וֹ יְ֝מִינ֗וֹ <WH3225> his right hand וּזְר֥וֹעַ <WH2220> arm קָדְשֽׁוֹ׃ <WH6944> and his holy

הוֹדִ֣יעַ <WH3045> hath made known יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> The LORD יְשׁוּעָת֑וֹ <WH3444> his salvation לְעֵינֵ֥י <WH5869> in the sight הַ֝גּוֹיִ֗ם <WH1471> of the heathen גִּלָּ֥ה <WH1540> hath he openly shewed צִדְקָתֽוֹ׃ <WH6666> his righteousness

זָ֘כַ֤ר <WH2142> He hath remembered חַסְדּ֨וֹ ׀ <WH2617> his mercy וֶֽאֱֽמוּנָתוֹ֮ <WH530> and his truth לְבֵ֪ית <WH1004> toward the house יִשְׂרָ֫אֵ֥ל <WH3478> of Israel רָא֥וּ <WH7200> have seen כָל־ <WH3605> All אַפְסֵי־ <WH657> all the ends אָ֑רֶץ <WH776> of the earth אֵ֝֗ת <WH853> יְשׁוּעַ֥ת <WH3444> the salvation אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <WH430> of our God

הָרִ֣יעוּ <WH7321> Make a joyful noise לַֽ֭יהוָה <WH3068> unto the LORD כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> all the earth פִּצְח֖וּ <WH6476> make a loud noise וְרַנְּנ֣וּ <WH7442> and rejoice וְזַמֵּֽרוּ׃ <WH2167> and sing
זַמְּר֣וּ <WH2167> Sing לַיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> unto the LORD בְּכִנּ֑וֹר <WH3658> with the harp בְּ֝כִנּ֗וֹר <WH3658> with the harp וְק֣וֹל <WH6963> and the voice זִמְרָֽה׃ <WH2172> of a psalm

בַּ֭חֲצֹ֣צְרוֹת <WH2689> With trumpets וְק֣וֹל <WH6963> and sound שׁוֹפָ֑ר <WH7782> of cornet הָ֝רִ֗יעוּ <WH7321> make a joyful noise לִפְנֵ֤י ׀ <WH6440> before הַמֶּ֬לֶךְ <WH4428> the King יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD
יִרְעַ֣ם <WH7481> roar הַ֭יָּם <WH3220> Let the sea וּמְלֹא֑וֹ <WH4393> and the fulness תֵּ֝בֵ֗ל <WH8398> thereof the world וְיֹ֣שְׁבֵי <WH3427> and they that dwell בָֽהּ׃
נְהָר֥וֹת <WH5104> Let the floods יִמְחֲאוּ־ <WH4222> clap כָ֑ף <WH3709> [their] hands יַ֝֗חַד <WH3162> together הָרִ֥ים <WH2022> let the hills יְרַנֵּֽנוּ׃ <WH7442> be joyful

לִֽפְֽנֵי־ <WH6440> Before יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD כִּ֥י <WH3588> for בָא֮ <WH935> for he cometh לִשְׁפֹּ֪ט <WH8199> to judge הָ֫אָ֥רֶץ <WH776> the earth יִשְׁפֹּֽט־ <WH8199> shall he judge תֵּבֵ֥ל <WH8398> the world בְּצֶ֑דֶק <WH6664> with righteousness וְ֝עַמִּ֗ים <WH5971> and the people בְּמֵישָׁרִֽים׃ <WH4339> with equity
